title: "Sample 500 frame candidates for gold set evaluation"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = F, message = F)
```

```{r}
library(here)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(ggthemes::theme_few())
```

```{r}
set_here(path = ".", verbose = TRUE)
```

Sample 500 random samples
```{r}
results <- read_csv("data/results.csv")
candidates <- results %>% 
  sample_n(500) %>%
  mutate(path=paste0("/image-", sprintf("%05d",frame), ".jpg")) %>%
  arrange(frame)
```

Save tibble
```{r}
write_csv(candidates, "data/gold_set_candidates.csv")
```
